entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning. Fog patches developing early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. High 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
